meanings.definition: A person who arranges or organizes a meeting or event.
meanings.sent1: The convener scheduled the meeting for next Monday.
meanings.sent2: The convener made sure everyone knew the time and place of the event.
meanings.sent3: The convener joked that they should have a meeting on the moon next time.
meanings.sent4: She was the convener of ideas, bringing them together like puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The convener's role was crucial in ensuring the success of the event.

meanings.definition: A person who brings people together for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: As the convener, he united the team to work towards a common goal.
meanings.sent2: The convener gathered experts from different fields to collaborate on the project.
meanings.sent3: The convener playfully suggested a team-building exercise involving a scavenger hunt.
meanings.sent4: She acted as a convener of hearts, fostering connections among strangers.
meanings.sent5: The convener's ability to unite individuals was truly remarkable.
